name: Mom Binzel's Lasagna
comments: Each piece should be pretty filling
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions; drain.
Cook ground beef and onion; drain grease. Add spaghetti sauce and tomato paste, stirring well; simmer 5-10 min.
In medium bowl beat eggs; add cottage cheese and Parmesan and mix well.

Grease 9x13" dish; place a layer of noodles on the bottom. Spoon about 1/3 cottage cheese mixture on the noodles, spreading evenly. Add 1/4 meat mixture, then 1/4 cheese. Repeat layers until ingredients are used up.
Bake uncovered for 30 min. Let stand about 10 min.
